profile: We Care Restoration Ltd. is a full-service restoration company.  We handle residential asbestos, fire, mold, sewer and water hazards and damage.  Our commitment is to restore your home to code safely, efficiently, and cost-effectively without cutting corners.  As the box around our logo suggests, we will look at a problem from all directions, from all corners, so that we can find the best solution.  We pride ourselves on listening to you and on keeping you informed along the way so that you know what your most cost-effective options are, understand the source and scope of the issue, know how it will be resolved, and know when you can expect the work to be done by so that you can get on with your day with confidence as you let us solve your problems.
products: qualify equipment for each type of jobs
specialities: restoration and renovation (water flood ,fire, mold, asbestos )
